name: Mr. Kipper
description: Ahighriderresident of theCrystal Palace, Mr. Kipper is a self-taught musician. Over the course of his career he worked as a DJ, composer, producer, performer and radio host.His music can be often heard on107.5 Dark Star, an interplanetary radio station. In2077, Mr. Kipper, in collaboration with a DJ duoPrivate Press, established a terrestrial radio station,99.9 Impulse. To promote it, he and Private Press went on anEarthtour.In June they hosted an event atRiot, a nightclub inWatson,Night City.
